alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 8:02PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River at Sunflower. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water begins to cover a small section of Moll Road northeast of Indianola. Water begins to spread across farmland from Jones Bayou. Widespread agricultural flooding is a occurring in this area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 24.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday morning and continue falling to 20.4 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 24.1 Mon 7 pm CST 23.7 23.4 22.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1015 AM CST.
